}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00001184-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Models=== :The same PCB is used for a few different models: *[[Edimax EW-7722UTn]] V3 (v3) *[[Edimax EW-7822GTN]] 3.0A (v3)
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.linux.org/threads/realtek-rtl8192fu-support.29852/ ''Realtek RTL8192FU support'' on '''linux.org''']
